column4: and anyone knows a software to send sms through the usb modem
anyone else on the sms through usb modem?
you need a mobile network provider for that

: the modem is with a network provider. here's the prob. i used prepaid internet sim card on my usb modem. so when i want to recharge, i need to send an empty sms let say to 555. so how do i do that, since in windows, u can do it through the modem manager thingy
the modem should provide linux software to do this
if not contact the modem provider for it
: too bad they dont, when i when to the office that day, they dont even know what's a linux :9
ubuntu-tweak is not something I'd recommend
you just remove the files you no longer want/need using the file manager
: not taking up space really , but i want my system to be smaller :)
how much space would you get removing those files ?
ok, so empathy is built into the unity desktop, do you really want to save 1MB of space that bad ?
try removing the empathy package from the package manager, it should remove those files if they are not needed
in what respect that, UPS is "uniterupted power supply"
